sections.title: Professional Snow Plowing Services
sections.content:
Don't let Michigan winters keep you stuck at home. BEAR GRADE offers reliable snow plowing services to keep your driveway and property accessible throughout the winter season. We provide both one-time service and seasonal contracts for residential and commercial properties.

Our team responds quickly to snow events, ensuring your driveway is cleared when you need it most. We use professional equipment to remove snow efficiently without damaging your driveway or landscaping.

sections.title: Snow Removal Services
sections.content:
- **Driveway Plowing**: Keep your driveway clear and safe
- **Parking Lot Plowing**: Commercial snow removal for businesses
- **Seasonal Contracts**: Priority service all winter long
- **Per-Storm Service**: One-time plowing when you need it
- **Quick Response**: We're ready when the snow falls

Prepare for winter now! Contact us to discuss seasonal contracts or on-call snow removal services.
